name: nightlight (bignastytruck (violet))
description:
cw: fear of the dark, not taking your own needs seriously, negative self-talk

controls: use wasd or arrow keys to move, any key to progress dialogue

made in a couple hours using candle's bipsi for the bipsi launch jam

the audio, "Atmosphere Cave (Loop)" by julius_galla, is licensed under CC BY 3.0 and was added using candle's "add bitsy audio" tool

for a version of the game with higher visual contrast, click here.

inspired by the nightlights i bought a couple weeks ago after finally deciding to take seriously a particularly long spell of being scared of the dark
